advanceToNextByte() - Method in class io.FileInput
If currently in the middle of a byte, advance to the beginning of the next byte, and don't read the rest of the current byte.
advanceToNextByte() - Method in class io.FileOutput
If the current byte is not full, write zeros until the beginning of the next byte.
ALPHABET_SIZE - Static variable in class pakkaajaMain.Main
(Huffman coding) Size of the array used to store character frequencies, or how many unique characters there are.
